entries.heavy_weapon_accuracy: By increasing the focus of your observation power, this supplement increases your accuracy with heavy weapons.
entries.heavy_weapon_speed: Once the deltoids expand the speed with which you can fire heavy weapons increases.
entries.thrown_speed: The Brachii muscles contract faster after an injection of this compound, allowing you to throw weapons faster.
entries.thrown_accuracy: By increasing the vision of your eyes and making it easier to track targets, this solution increases your accuracy with thrown weapons.
entries.carbine_accuracy: By aligning the muscle mass of the wrist and forearm you can fire a carbine weapon with greater accuracy.
entries.carbine_speed: By increasing the muscle mass of the wrist and forearm you can fire a carbine weapon with greater speed.
entries.mask_scent: This liquid contains specially designed pheremones that hide the smells normally produced by a living organism, allowing them to hide from creatures that use scent to track predators and prey.
entries.melee_defense: By thickening the skin for a short period of time your defense against melee attacks is increased.
entries.onehandmelee_accuracy: With the triceps stretched to above normal standards your accuracy improves with one handed weapons.
entries.onehandmelee_speed: By increasing the flexibility of your tendons you become faster with one handed weapons.
entries.pistol_accuracy: By increasing your focused vision you can become more accurate with pistols using this formula.
entries.pistol_speed: By increasing the muscle tension in your fingers you can increase the speed with which you fire a pistol.
entries.polearm_accuracy: Your accuracy with a polearm is increased with the use of this shot, giving your biceps a temporary boost.
entries.polearm_speed: By expanding different parts of the muscles in specific ways the speed with which you can wield a long weapon (pole-arm) is increased.
entries.ranged_accuracy: The accuracy of your attacks with all ranged weapons is improved with this formula that enhances your long range vision for a short time.
entries.rifle_accuracy: Your accuracy with the rifle is improved by this chemical by allowing your vision to focus at a longer range than normal.
entries.rifle_speed: By increasing the metacarpal muscles reaction time you can increase the speed with which you can fire a rifle.
entries.twohandmelee_accuracy: By enlarging the ligaments of your muscles for a brief time you can hit more accurately with heavy two-handed weapons.
entries.twohandmelee_speed: By increasing the tension in your muscles you can attack with heavy two-handed weapons faster than normal.
entries.unarmed_accuracy: By increasing your focus this chemical makes your unarmed attacks more accurate.
entries.unarmed_speed: By increasing muscle flexibility you can increase the speed with which you make unarmed attacks.
entries.ranged_defense: The synthesized Muscle Stimulant (or SMS) enhances your ranged defenses for a short period of time.
entries.melee_accuracy: This vapor improves your focus and enhances your melee combat accuracy for a short while.
